charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1101_0:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard the sound of
a Pokémon barking in the distance.

Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] wandered over to where
the sound was coming from.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_0:
Oh, hey! That you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Didn’t realize it was you walking up here.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0401_0:
Oh, I was just trying to get Granbull here
to help me with a painting.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0402_0:
Oh, I was just trying to get Granbull here
to help me with a painting.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_1:
My theme is “Granbull at the PML,” so I
wanted him to do a dynamic pose for me—
like he’s battling hard at the tournament!

It’s a win-win situation. I get a model
to paint, and posing like that gets Granbull
into a more competitive mind-set.

C’mon, Granbull. Why don’t you
come say hello to [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Aw! You getting scared again, Granbull?

Sorry, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
He gets a little timid around other people.

Pasio’s, like, full of people he’s never seen before,
so lately he’s been even more of a scaredy-cat
than usual.

But despite all that, one of Granbull’s goals
is to triumph at the PML.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0401_1:
Yep! It’s a funny story, actually...
So, my Granbull has this habit of chomping on
whatever it is that makes him happy or excited.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0402_2:
Well, it’s a funny story, actually...
My Granbull has this habit of chomping on
whatever it is that makes him happy or excited.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_2:
And, like, the first time we saw an ad for the PML
on TV, he launched himself right up toward
the screen!

He was just going at it! Chomping and
chomping and chomping on the TV...

And I was just, like, super shocked!
It all happened so fast, you know?

That wasn’t the only time he did it, either.
Every time the PML ad came on TV,
he’d run up and chomp away.

I was super touched when I realized how
eager my timid Granbull was to come to
a crowded place like this!

Even more reason for us to dominate in
the tournament. Better watch out—we’re
not gonna go easy on you, either!
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0401_2:
You seem pretty strong, so we’ll be
comin’ at you with everything we’ve got.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0302_2: Guess I’d better watch out, then.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0402_3:
You’re not making fun of me, are you?
’Cause we’re super strong, too, you know!
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_3:
Oh no—my painting!
It’s gonna get blown away!

Phew! Looks like Granbull caught it
just in the nick of time!
I knew I could count on you, boy!

Aw, man... I think the paint got messed
up, though. Granbull must have chewed
on it a little bit.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0301_3: That means he must like it!
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0401_3: Well, I AM pretty proud of it!

You know, I don’t even really mind that
it got ruined. It’s enough for me just
knowing that Granbull loved it!
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0402_4:
Not necessarily...
Granbull must have chomped onto this
painting because he really liked it.

And if that’s the case, I don’t really mind
that it got ruined.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_4: I mean, look how happy Granbull looks!

I bet if you got close to him now, he wouldn’t
be afraid anymore, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

He may be a scaredy-cat, but he knows a nice
person when he sees one.
I actually think Granbull might really like you!
